Package model

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
model.Grid
public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Grid​(int rows, int columns, int mirrors)
    Name: Grid Constructor method of a grid.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Cell createBox​(int i, int j)
    Name: createBox Method used to create a cell (node) of the grid (linked matrix).
    void createGridDown​(int i, int j, Cell currentFirstRow)
    Name: createGridDown Recursive method used to create the first cell (node) of each row of the grid.
    void displayDown​(Cell first)
    Name: displayDown Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method displayRight for it to display the boxes from a same row of the grid through brackets with a symbol inside or not.
    void displayDownTemp​(Cell first, Cell chosen)
    Name: displayDownTemp Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method displayRightTemp for it to display the boxes from a same row of the grid through brackets with 'S' ("Start"), 'E' ("End") or even 'M' (Same start and end) inside or not.
    void finishRoad​(Cell chosen)
    Name: finishRoad Method to be invoked when the traversal did by the laser beam through the grid finished.
    int getColumns()  
    int getCounterMirrors()  
    boolean getFinish()  
    Cell getFirst()  
    int getMirrors()  
    int getRows()  
    void moveDown​(Cell chosen)
    Name: moveDown Recursive method used to the laser beam to do a downward direction traversal through the grid.
    void moveLeft​(Cell chosen)
    Name: moveLeft Recursive method used to the laser beam to do a left direction traversal through the grid.
    void moveRight​(Cell chosen)
    Name: moveRight Recursive method used to the laser beam to do a right direction traversal through the grid.
    void moveUp​(Cell chosen)
    Name: moveUp Recursive method used to the laser beam to do an upward direction traversal through the grid.
    void randomMirrorsDown​(Cell cell)
    Name: randomMirrorsDown Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method randomMirrorsRight for it to randomly assign or not a mirror to a cell in a same row of the grid.
    Cell searchBoxDown​(java.lang.String nomenclature, Cell first)
    Name: searchBoxDown Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method searchBoxRight for it to search in a same row the existence of a cell (node) in the grid.
    void setColumns​(int columns)  
    void setCounterMirrors​(int counterMirrors)  
    void setFinish​(boolean finish)  
    void setFirst​(Cell first)  
    void setMirrors​(int mirrors)  
    void setRows​(int rows)  
    void showMirrorsDown​(Cell first)
    Name: showMirrorsDown Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method showMirrorsRight for it to display the boxes from a same row of the grid through brackets, revealing the mirrors' location with '\' or '/' inside or not.

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Grid

      public Grid​(int rows, int columns, int mirrors)
      Name: Grid Constructor method of a grid.
      Parameters:
      rows - - Grid rows - rows = int, rows != null, nickname != 0.
      columns - - Grid columns - columns = int, columns != null, columns != 0.
      mirrors - - Number of mirrors in the game.getGrid() - mirrors = int, mirrors != null, mirrors != 0.

      public void setFirst​(Cell first)

    • createGridDown

      public void createGridDown​(int i, int j, Cell currentFirstRow)
      Name: createGridDown Recursive method used to create the first cell (node) of each row of the grid.
      pre: The first cell (node) of the grid was already created.
      post: All first boxes (nodes) of each row of the grid in question were created.
      Parameters:
      i - - Current numerical row - i = int, i != null
      j - - Current numerical column - j = int, j != null
      currentFirstRow - - Current cell - currentFirstRow = Cell object

    • createBox

      public Cell createBox​(int i, int j)
      Name: createBox Method used to create a cell (node) of the grid (linked matrix).
      pre: Grid already initialized.
      post: Cell created.
      Parameters:
      i - - Current numerical row - i = int, i != null
      j - - Current numerical column - j = int, j != null
      Returns:
      A new Cell object (node) to link it to the grid.

    • randomMirrorsDown

      public void randomMirrorsDown​(Cell cell)
      Name: randomMirrorsDown Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method randomMirrorsRight for it to randomly assign or not a mirror to a cell in a same row of the grid.
      pre: The grid was already created with all its boxes (nodes).
      post: The random process of assigning mirrors to the boxes (nodes) was done.
      Parameters:
      cell - - First cell (node) of a row - cell = Cell object

    • displayDown

      public void displayDown​(Cell first)
      Name: displayDown Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method displayRight for it to display the boxes from a same row of the grid through brackets with a symbol inside or not.
      pre: The grid was already created with all its boxes (nodes).
      post: The boxes (nodes) from the grid were displayed through brackets with a symbol inside or not.
      Parameters:
      first - - First cell (node) of a row - first = Cell object

    • displayDownTemp

      public void displayDownTemp​(Cell first, Cell chosen)
      Name: displayDownTemp Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method displayRightTemp for it to display the boxes from a same row of the grid through brackets with 'S' ("Start"), 'E' ("End") or even 'M' (Same start and end) inside or not.
      pre: The grid was already created with all its boxes (nodes).
      post: The boxes (nodes) from the grid were displayed through brackets with 'S' ("Start"), 'E' ("End") or even 'M' (Same start and end) inside or not.
      Parameters:
      first - - First cell (node) of a row - first = Cell object
      chosen - - Chosen cell (node) to begin the laser shot - chosen = Cell object - chosen != null

    • showMirrorsDown

      public void showMirrorsDown​(Cell first)
      Name: showMirrorsDown Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method showMirrorsRight for it to display the boxes from a same row of the grid through brackets, revealing the mirrors' location with '\' or '/' inside or not.
      pre: The grid was already created with all its boxes (nodes).
      post: The boxes (nodes) from the grid were displayed through brackets, revealing the mirrors' location with '\' or '/' inside or not.
      Parameters:
      first - - First cell (node) of a row - first = Cell object

    • searchBoxDown

      public Cell searchBoxDown​(java.lang.String nomenclature, Cell first)
      Name: searchBoxDown Method used to go to the next row of the grid, while evoking the recursive method searchBoxRight for it to search in a same row the existence of a cell (node) in the grid.
      pre: The grid was already created with all its boxes (nodes).
      post: Searching process determined of a cell (node) from the grid.
      Parameters:
      nomenclature - - Cell nomenclature - nomenclature = String, nomenclature != null, nomenclature != ""
      first - - First cell (node) of a row - first = Cell object
      Returns:
      A Cell object different from null if the cell (node) in question was found in the grid, or with null if not.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft​(Cell chosen)
      Name: moveLeft Recursive method used to the laser beam to do a left direction traversal through the grid.
      pre: The grid was already created with all its boxes (nodes). The user has already fired the laser beam in a cell (node) of the grid.
      Parameters:
      chosen - - Chosen cell (node) to begin the laser shot, that then will become the current cell in the traversal - chosen = Cell object

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight​(Cell chosen)
      Name: moveRight Recursive method used to the laser beam to do a right direction traversal through the grid.
      pre: The grid was already created with all its boxes (nodes). The user has already fired the laser beam in a cell (node) of the grid.
      Parameters:
      chosen - - Chosen cell (node) to begin the laser shot, that then will become the current cell in the traversal - chosen = Cell object

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp​(Cell chosen)
      Name: moveUp Recursive method used to the laser beam to do an upward direction traversal through the grid.
      pre: The grid was already created with all its boxes (nodes). The user has already fired the laser beam in a cell (node) of the grid.
      Parameters:
      chosen - - Chosen cell (node) to begin the laser shot, that then will become the current cell in the traversal - chosen = Cell object

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown​(Cell chosen)
      Name: moveDown Recursive method used to the laser beam to do a downward direction traversal through the grid.
      pre: The grid was already created with all its boxes (nodes). The user has already fired the laser beam in a cell (node) of the grid.
      Parameters:
      chosen - - Chosen cell (node) to begin the laser shot, that then will become the current cell in the traversal - chosen = Cell object

    • finishRoad

      public void finishRoad​(Cell chosen)
      Name: finishRoad Method to be invoked when the traversal did by the laser beam through the grid finished. Updates of the cell object entered by parameter are made, and the displayDownTemp method is invoked.
      pre: The laser beam traversal through the grid finished.
      Parameters:
      chosen - - Cell (node) where the laser beam finished its traversal - chosen = Cell object, chosen != null
